Median of all compensation (including tips, bonus, and overtime) by years of experience. For Electronics Technicians, experience does not seem to be a major factor in determining pay. The average worker who claims fewer than five years of experience earns around $36K. In contrast, however, individuals who report five to 10 years in this occupation see a much larger median of $44K.
